lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I have received many blessings and I want to help those who need them

lenders.name: Starr
lenders.loan_because: This introduction to Kiva was the best Xmas gift I received.  Hope the gift certificate helps.

lenders.name: James & Vi
lenders.loan_because: Whether it be with kindness, sound advice, or a small loan, we can all make a difference. We just have to try. A little help can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info:
James manages and leads a team of engineers deploying and maintaining computer servers for a global pharmaceuticals company.

Vi manages risk for a global engineering company.

lenders.name: Cat
lenders.loan_because: People need help
lenders.occupational_info: Experimental Organic backyard farm on one acre of land.  Practicing sustainable living in a residential area.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Building prosperity around the world is building peace.

lenders.name: Lucimara & Julia
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people to have the same opportunities that I already have in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Special: Love is something to share not something to keep inside of you.

lenders.name: Bonny
lenders.loan_because: I have always been very fortunate and would like to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I put people to sleep for surgery so that they do not feel pain or remember the surgery.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.occupational_info: I assist First Time Buyers purchase thier first home. I help them obtain financial assistance through various Government agencies. This assistance allows them to purchase a home with little to no money out their pocket.

lenders.name: keem and mike
lenders.loan_because: Everyone wants to be and deserves to be treated with dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: Keem is a nurse in the ER and works for Hospice of Spokane and I teach students with emotional disorders and learning disabilities.

lenders.name: Perry, Maria & Jada
lenders.loan_because: I wish to touch someone elses heart.  To help them know their not alone in this world.  I've been blessed by GOD and wish to share the blessings to others.  I understand that all it takes is someone to trust in another to make a difference in this world.  There is so much evil and hatred in this world - to bring some love to someone else in this world is not only a blessing for them, but a major blessing for me and my family.
lenders.occupational_info: II'm a business onwer myself and here I am today - BLESSED BY THE LORD GOD!

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: there's no greater feeling than helping others. I think everyone is entitled to the same opportunities and resources.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It's a fantastic way to give a bit back to the worldwide community whilst empowering the entrepreneurs involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I support schools with their development.

lenders.name: Mike & Karen
lenders.loan_because: We prefer giving people a helping hand instead of a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: Before retiring Mike worked in an oil refinery and Karen worked in a doctor's office.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that we must all share what wealth we have with those less fortunate than ourselves

lenders.name: Michelle March
lenders.loan_because: I believe if we all gave a little what a difference we could make in the lives of those who need it the most!!

lenders.name: John and Karen
lenders.loan_because: We want all small businesses to have a chance to be successful and grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital ensuring all revenue is posted and billed correctly.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is our duty as people to assist those in need. We are supposedly a global society now and we have the resources to provide what is needed for the entire world population. We just need the compassion, desire, and means to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise team members in the building whose goal is to make sure the right product gets to the right stores to support sales.

lenders.name: Mark and Alice
lenders.loan_because: We want to help in any small way we can.

lenders.name: Fantasy Bath, Inc
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacture and sell handmade bath and body products worldwide.  We wish you all the success you deserve and hope all of your businesses will thrive.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Changing the world one penny at a time.  It can be a better place for not only my children, but everyones.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an auto repair garage and a notary service selling licence plates.

lenders.name: jackson
lenders.loan_because: i loan cause its fun

lenders.name: Susan M.
lenders.loan_because: I think we all need to give back from what we are given. None of us is separate from another. Since I'm fortunate to live in the USA with a job and health care - a wealthy person compared to most of the world - I feel an obligation to assist others to live better. I give primarily to women and in risky areas of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a former bank VP who has worked in non-profits and the Episcopal church for the past 18 years.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to see your loan go directly to people who need it and who are trying to improve their situation in life, in regions of the world that could use plenty of assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: Federal employee for the Canadian Government. We are responsible for the clean water,  waste water and fueling stations at an army base in Kingston Ontario.

lenders.name: vic
lenders.loan_because: its a positive way to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I have enough, it´s time to share.
lenders.occupational_info: Chalenging, rewarding and exciting. Meeting people and see them find their strengths and use them. Set their goals and reach them!

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: I want to see the results of my help. I think this is a fantastic idea as it is helping people to better help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in school library.

lenders.name: Sylvia & Rick
lenders.loan_because: we are grateful for the abundance in our lives; therefore, we would like to help others living in developing countries who do not have the opportunities we americans enjoy.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Just doing my small part...a lot of small parts can make a big difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Dick
lenders.loan_because: I need to help others out of thankfulness
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Project Team member & basketball coach

lenders.name: Marisa
lenders.loan_because: it's great to be able to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a tenth grade student at Wayzata High School.  I was able to go to Nicaragua on a mission trip summer of 2013.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I lend for several reasons but no matter what the other reasons are we are all one big family on this planet and well family takes care of its own no matter where one lives.  This is just one more wonderful way to help family around the world do better for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is simple I answer phones, take customer orders on products for a major televised retailer in the United States.  Television Sales Customer Service Representative.

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: In the US, we are becoming so accustomed to big box businesses that we forget most of the rest of the world operates as one-to-one businesses.  I want to support that to the extent I can -- this is one way!
lenders.occupational_info: I earn my living as an accountant and manager.  I get enjoyment and fulfillment from making bead jewelry by hand.  My cat, Riley, helps a lot!

lenders.name: John and Jenika
lenders.loan_because: We are siblings who want to help as much as possible.  We feel that we have so many blessings that we should help others to make a better life for themselves
lenders.occupational_info:
John: I wake up at 6:15 in the morning to get ready for marching band where I learn how to play my instrument and get self discipline. Then I learn biology, which is how living things work. Next I learn the language of latin. I learn some math later and then learn some of the history of our planet. Lastly I learn more about my first language of English.

Jenika:  I go to college to learn lots of exciting stuff, including English, Logic, Computer Science, and Fencing

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I loan because there is such a need and we have so much.

lenders.name: P Family
lenders.loan_because: If a family can support themselves, their children can go to school and I believe that education is the key to making the world a safer, better home for all of us.  Supporting women's education and financial independence is especially important to me because the mother is the heart of the family and her success will lead her children to a better life.  I am also a hobby seamstress, so sewing is one of my favorite Kiva businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: Wife's primary job is homemaker, but she also works part-time helping people over the phone while children are in school.  Husband is a businessman that works in a large office building.  Our children help us choose our Kiva partners.  One child is studying medical research at a major university and specializing in the parasites that cause problems in many of the Kiva countries.  One child is independent while the other is still in school.

lenders.name: Mary Rose
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed enough in this life to be able to lend a hand to those who wish to make a better life for themselves and their families. Many thanks to my family for helping to get this started through their generous Christmas gifts and good luck to all the businesses which will recieve loans from Kiva.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: To help those who want to help themselves & make a difference.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have, and am able to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a "dorm" on campus where college students live while they're getting an education.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I hope I can help others in developing countries improve their standard of living and sense of self-worth.

lenders.name: Denny
lenders.loan_because: I am very interested in facilitating independent living.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with an international relief organization.

lenders.name: Jon and Carmen
lenders.loan_because: we are the first generation on the planet that can end poverty. Spread the Gratitude.

lenders.name: David

lenders.loan_because: I know that one person can change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop communities for my friends and family to thrive into the future.

Dan: maintain communications network.
Lori: health care industry.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: "We are each the source of the other's river".  - Noah benShea

lenders.name: josh
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I am a kid

lenders.occupational_info: I am a special education teacher.  I like to say I work with students who are talented in non-traditional ways.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: Making a difference is what life is all about, helping others does wonders for self worth
lenders.occupational_info: I help hard working people by processing their pay checks accurately and on time

lenders.name: Micah
lenders.loan_because: My daddy is helping me to learn about giving.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to please my dad in whatever way I can.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: It's good to be able to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a junior studying engineering at the University of Minnesota.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: Helping people is what we should all do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in 4th grade this year and school is getting more challenging.  I like language/reading and science the best.  I like to dance and play piano too.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I think that by KIVA giving women the opportunity to financially support their children by helping them start their own business is a blessing.

lenders.name: ellen
lenders.loan_because: a little can do a lot.

lenders.name: Malinda
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a happy life

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help young mothers provide for their children.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: My son Tim  gave me the membership as a Christmas gift and made me aware of Kiva. I'm glad he did!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired from the communications industry.

lenders.name: Deirdre
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I have a business and I've known what it is like to need funding to move to the next step.  I love having a positive impact on the livelihood of another!
lenders.occupational_info: I have been creating my entire life, from being a designer of clothing to a designer of living spaces to creating and writing daily in my blog.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I am selfish and love to soak up the happiness it returns to me.  Knowing I am helping someone in need.  Giving is the best feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a consultant for a telecommunications company.

lenders.name: Heidi & Dylan
lenders.loan_because: We all need each other.

lenders.name: Marcos & Lucas
lenders.loan_because: We loan because the families that we will loan to don't have all the things that we do.  God blessed us so we want to help others.

lenders.name: GAMMA Salt
lenders.loan_because: We want to help on the making of a better world for  future generations. Set an example to our children and Thank God for what we have and for all His blessings.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Because it was a gift that I wish to place and then to never hear from you again.
lenders.occupational_info: Industrial, Office building development and brokerage.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: I can. Why not help if you are in a position to - even if the amount is small. Every little bit helps.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has a right to pursue their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I am a technology strategist - I help companies find new ways to innovate and to apply emerging technologies

lenders.name: Mark and Beth
lenders.loan_because: Our families came to the United States generations ago and we are blessed with the life our ancestors allowed us to have in a land so full of opportunity.  It is our hope to help others around the world achieve a good, safe and secure life for their descendants in places where opportunity may not be as present as it is here.
lenders.occupational_info: Beth is a school nurse and has worked extensively with disabled children.  Mark designs businesses to work as a balance of products, processes and resources.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward....

lenders.occupational_info: I make and improve software to work better.

lenders.name: Phyllis

lenders.occupational_info: Father is a geologist, children are students, and mother does volunteer work in the community.

lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance.

lenders.name: Roch & Daphne
lenders.loan_because: I want to use well what I was given.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: My sister  gave me a gift certificate for Christmas.  It was my favorite present.  My degree is in International Relations/Global Studies and it is good to know I can participate with kiva.org to make a good thing happen.
lenders.occupational_info:
I currently draw and paint and plan to sculpt.  I also make jewelry.  
Recently I have been focusing on writing.

lenders.name: Thea
lenders.loan_because: it increases justice and peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an educator of children.

lenders.name: Barry

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a hotel consultant, sworn translator and former Hony. Consul General of Sri Lanka in Spain (1990-2011)

lenders.name: stephen
lenders.loan_because: to help, of course

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It gives me immense satisfaction to help people who want to help themselves.  Many people are willing to work hard and just need a hand up.  I like that the money goes directly to the person I am helping and that I get to give it out over and over again.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a community hospital providing care to those living with cancer.

lenders.name: veronica
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long way.  My kids participate too.
lenders.occupational_info: Lending money, giving hope, inspiring entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: The Dahls
lenders.occupational_info: High School math teacher

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Helping your "neighbor" is important.  Living in America is a wonderful advantage, and helping others is what life is about.
lenders.occupational_info: Now retired; before, worked for major USA companies in building consumer products.

lenders.name: Tamika
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me so that I may be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Tien
lenders.occupation: High School Rep for the Art Institutes

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.occupational_info: A global humanitarian organization, committed to saving the lives of malnourished children and families while creating sustainable solutions to hunger.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my family with the capacity, and therefore the responsibility, to help others in need. I appreciate the chance to help other parents make a living and better provide for their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a homemaker, or "housewife." I take care of our children, our household, a small garden, and several animals.

lenders.name: jessica
lenders.loan_because: My social conscience tells me to
lenders.occupational_info: I research ways to control insects that spread disease

lenders.name: Aran & Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Aran is a student at the University of Oregon.  Stacy is a land use planner at Lane Council of Governments.

lenders.name: Bianca
lenders.loan_because: It makes me smile to know that I can help make someone else's dreams become reality by loaning even a small amount.
lenders.occupational_info: I make Fitness and Exercise fun, while motivating and showing individuals new ways of strength training and weight training  to add new variety to one's workouts. So that they  can accomplish any physical goals they have for themselves.

lenders.name: Cassel
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe in transforming the world into a better place.

lenders.name: 4Weeks
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: I received this Kiva "gift certificate" for a Christmas present and am happy to loan to help someone get a good start!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I've had people help me along the way and I think it's "Good Karma" to help others.  So what goes around, comes around, and I guess it's my turn and and an opportunity to do something good.

lenders.name: Kurt & Inok
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those who are trying to better their lives. It is so encouraging to learn about these wonderful entreprenuers across the world.

lenders.name: Art Z.
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do.

Plus, I see where my money goes whereas in a traditional organization, huge amounts of money gets pooled together for more nameless purposes.

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: This is such a brilliant concept!  What an amazing way to make a contribution to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people on social assistance find work, training or educational upgrading.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: In order to have a profitable  and successful economy , you must reinvest in it.

lenders.name: Doug Wilson
lenders.loan_because: I want to help enable people who are willing to take chances and work hard.
lenders.occupational_info: I direct / manage Quality Assurance testing efforts to help ensure that computer software is built, or implemented, in a manner that results in high customer satisfaction.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is through the caring of individuals around the world that we can indeed change the world, one person, one family at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company to earn my money and to help the lives of many suffering from illnesses that need treatment.  My passions include my family (patient and loving husband, our twins born in Cambodia and our daughter born in China) and the US branch of an NGO that I started as a non-profit organization that does similar work specifically in Cambodia, making the poorest communities self sustainable (www.tabithausa.org).

lenders.name: Susan and Geoffrey
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is an awesome opportunity to participate, person-to-person, with individuals in the improvement of the lives of themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a small bookselling business,  we love to travel and spend time with our grandchildren.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer.  I design buildings to withstand forces of nature - earthquakes, wind, etc.

lenders.name: kerry
lenders.loan_because: It is a direct way to help even the playing field
lenders.occupational_info: We work with children to help them have access to books and learning experiences before they start school.

lenders.name: Hugo
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big difference in the life of someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage software engineers who implement a financial services web site for a company based in San Francisco.

lenders.name: Jan K
lenders.loan_because: I am now able to. I know what it's like to barely have enough money to survive, much less to indulge in small pleasures and help others. Now that my circumstances have improved, one of my pleasures is helping to provide  someone else with an opportunity to improve their life.

lenders.name: MARGARET
lenders.loan_because: i want to help make a difference and to bring the best of life to those in need.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs, especially women, in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: With my husband I run an Educational Consultancy business specializing in Brain Based Learning and Anti-Bullying/Safe schools workshops, consultancy and resources.

lenders.name: Trond
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large Norwegian media company where I produce ads for newspapers and the internet.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: it makes the world a better place and by golly I like it!
lenders.occupational_info: metals distributor

lenders.name: Bella
lenders.loan_because: My uncle gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas.  I thought it would be nice to give money  to someone that needs help with their business.  I am now 11 years old but all most 12 I will be in the begining of April.  I will tell my friends about Kiva so that they can help also.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the 6th grade in California, USA.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I am  a Christian!

lenders.name: louie

lenders.name: Mary Jane

lenders.occupational_info: I help schools and companies with new projects in efficient ways to grow bigger and/or better in the services they deliver.

lenders.name: Ya-Ya Sisters
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of friends that get together every week.  We have known each other for many years.  Since we appreciate all that we have, for our birthdays we decided to give a Kiva loan to others that were working for a better life.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to help people help themselves. I feel it a privilege to loan.

lenders.name: Ya, Ya Sisters
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of friends that get together every week.  We have known each other for many years.  Since we appreciate all that we have, for our birthdays we decided to give a Kiva loan to others that were working for a better life.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in need is what my Lord has commanded, which is to help my brothers in need; and is an expression of His and my love for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop by researching and writing educational curriculum to help others become better leaders, people, and business men and women.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: it's what gives my life meaning.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to narrow down the many disparities that exist in the world.

lenders.name: Adam & Bethany

lenders.loan_because: Great way to make money work for something good while individuals maintain their dignity
lenders.occupational_info: I grow and sell fruits and vegetables to local customers

lenders.loan_because: i am an entrepreneur too and the people who believed in me at the beginning of my business venture made a huge difference in my life and the life of our family.  it is important to Cathy and i and the kids to help other entrepreneurs around the world get their start!
lenders.occupational_info: janet teaches karate and violence prevention in her school and in local schools, community groups and businesses.  Cathy is a trauma nurse.  We have 5 daughters.

lenders.name: walter
lenders.loan_because: I always would like to help people specially the ones who start there own bussiness because i know how difficult it is to start one and to have someone who believes in you.

lenders.name: Kristi & Christopher
lenders.loan_because:
When we travel we often meet motivated, honest people that just need a chance to succeed.  Kiva offers us the opportunity to give back when we have been so fortunate personally.
Also, Chris is an entrepreneur running a small software business with his father and brother.  He relates very strongly to small business owners and knows how hard it can be to get started.
lenders.occupational_info:
Kristi is in marketing and is responsible for advertising, promotion, public relations, etc.
Chris handles the technology and finances for his small business.  The business is a niche software firm that deals with restaurant and hospitality companies, as well as alcoholic beverage manufacturers and suppliers.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I am lucky enough to be employed, healthy, and happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 12 year old children.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: It's an honor to be a part of so many great projects doing great things around the world :)

lenders.name: Winston
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small contributions by  individuals into a collective pool will result in tremendous benefits for the recipients.  This will help our world become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform surgery.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I understand being poor and needing a helping hand.  My father was a farm labor worker who worked 7 days a week to make ends meet.   It is now my time to give an opportunity to my fellow man.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business improve there profits

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help
lenders.occupational_info: Sales

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference - pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired from many years in the international hotel industry.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: It may help........

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: It's interesting, fun and helpful
lenders.occupational_info: I help young people become more independent and improve the quality of thier lives - and I play music for people to dance to.

lenders.name: Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: It feels right and I like to support a larger community other than the one solely within my own borders.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to paint and laugh.

lenders.name: Marian and Theo
lenders.loan_because: It's our way to support other members of our world that  we know and for what business we support them. But also to stay in close contact with them and their efforts starting and/or expanding their business.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: it is a privilege to be able to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants of all ages.

lenders.name: Steve and Theresa
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed by the Lord and we want to pass it along.
lenders.occupational_info: We take care of our growing family

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I get excited that I could actually make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage meetings and events for different companies. I plan and make sure they have everything they need for a successful time!

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
Not to know is bad.  
 Not to want to know is worse.
  Not to hope is unthinkable.  
  Not to care is unforgivable”
-Nigerian saying
lenders.occupational_info: I produce and publish map books or street atlases for seven counties of the Puget Sound Region in Washington

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.loan_because:
I feel I have been blessed with so much that I find this a wonderful way to give back.
Thank you for giving me this opportunity.

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: Winston reminded me that there is much that humility can do for humanity both near and far.
lenders.occupational_info: I work toward making healthcare easier for people to access.

lenders.name: B.J.
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur  I want to help other entrepreneurs whose work benefits their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide cognitive assessment-based coaching for leadership development and for improvement of ADD behaviors in adults.

lenders.name: Richard M
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm now disabled due to lung disease and unable to work.  Previously, I worked as a social worker in not for profit human services.

lenders.name: Kathleen and Hank
lenders.loan_because: it's so easy and inexpensive to make a big difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: The Harris Family
lenders.loan_because: We have many blessings in our lives, and we want to give back and spread blessings to others.

lenders.name: REK
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children that it does not take alot of money to make a difference in the world. Just alot of Love and Respect of our fellow human beings.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I'm paying it forward to other women.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: We all live together on this small planet earth.  If we want to have a better life and better future for everyone we must help each other in any way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: My job was helping people with problems such as sickness or disability to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Ben Wacksman
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people! All people!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur and business executive.

lenders.name: Brennan
lenders.loan_because: people in other countries do not have the same opportunities as I have in the U.S.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: My grandmothers, Babe Schlatter and Emily Culberson, taught me by example to give to those in need.

lenders.name: Marlies
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful thing to do! My brother gave me a gift certificate for Kiva and I just think it's great. It's a small way for me to make a big difference in the life of someone who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher specializing in French immersion and language acquisition.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an accountant for a government agency that handles business functions for all school districts in our county.

lenders.name: Stephen & Stela
lenders.loan_because: We know that if we all would share a little of our good fortune to those who have very little, the world would be a better place.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can and I like the idea of helping people to help them selves.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: if i can and you can, then they can!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a geophysicist.

lenders.name: Aaron A.
lenders.loan_because: I owe much of my success to strangers who placed their faith in me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant for a network of hospitals in Alaska.

lenders.name: 4Peace
lenders.loan_because:
It will make the world a better place.  It encourages those who endevour to advance themselves, their families & communities even in the face of great hardship.
It offers a gesture of respect for entreprenurial talent rather than a quickly passing act of charity.
A fishing rod is a greater gift than a fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I show industries how to better use computers to keep track of information.

lenders.name: John S
lenders.loan_because: This has to be one of the best possible ways to make a large and direct difference in the lives of people working their way out of poverty - and proof that we live in a flat world - not just because we can now sell our goods to anyone, anywhere but also because we can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the creative director for a retail design and implementation  group - we provide strategy for retail worldwide.

lenders.name: Meridee
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the strength of giving a hand up not just a hand out.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to find fulfillment, happiness and self satisfaction.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 14-18 year olds about English literature - everything from Shakespeare to modern film!

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to share the Blessings  I have.

lenders.name: sara
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: No matter where people are born, they deserve access to the same resources.  Microlending brings this dream one step closer to reality.

lenders.name: Stephen and Brenda
lenders.loan_because: As with most really good things, it was suggested by a friend.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large multi-national professional services firm and my wife is a pharmacist.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I can help someone improve the quality of their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a marketing coach and I am currently helping Realtors market themselves more effectively and build their client database.

lenders.name: MGJ&Z
lenders.loan_because: There are few life lessons more important to pass along to our kids than the importance of helping others.  Kiva is a beautiful tool in SO many ways - thank you!

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because:
There is more happiness in giving 
than in receiving.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals and dreams.

lenders.name: Una & Jerry
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy being part of this grassroot effort to help people around the globe and being able to watch their progress. Thanks  to Kiva and all who partake!

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: When I have been in need, people have always stepped up and helped out. I have been blessed to live a comfortable life and everyone deserves the same.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very quiet but I am lucky to work with a great group of people who are very supportive. We make sure our company's computer systems stay up and running.

lenders.name: Randy Baca`
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending is the best kind of economic development!  Improving the financial condition of a single family can help change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write poetry, books, articles---anything involving words--which I love.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in humanity.  I believe that we are all here to help one another.  I believe that everyone can help whether they are rich or poor, big or small, black or white.  I believe we all need help at some time in our lives.

lenders.name: Devon
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others and know that if it weren't for the people in my life I wouldn't be where I am today. I live to help those less fortunate than me in any way I can.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone has needed help at one time or another

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: I believe anyone with a good idea and a strong work ethic deserves the chance to make their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist companies in raising capital by issuing equity or partnering with financial sponsors and by advising them in M&A transactions.

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I CARE.

lenders.name: Tim & Nienke
lenders.loan_because: this way of financing stimulates more than just 1 company or 1 person to achieve something in life. It also has great impact on the local economies if the entrepreneur is succesfull because of the financing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the owner of a hard chrome plating facility in the eastern part of the Netherlands. Next to hard chrome plating of various products, we also do cnc wheel grinding, cnc turning and milling and powder coating. I have 17 people working for me.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: "if you have the power to change the world, it is your responsibility to help change it ."
